Health and Wellness Fair

  • Thursday, Oct. 10, 2024
  • 8 a.m.-2 p.m.

  • Dallas College Brookhaven Campus, S064
    3939 Valley View Lane, Farmers Branch TX 75244
  • Dallas College Cedar Valley Campus, M064
    3030 N. Dallas Ave., Lancaster TX 75134
  • Dallas College Eastfield Campus, E064
    3737 Motley Drive, Mesquite TX 75150

This is the summary of the event. Join Dallas College Fitness Centers for a Health and Wellness Fair on campus. Find resources that promote physical activity.

Join Dallas College Fitness Centers for a Health and Wellness Fair on campus. Find resources that promote physical activity and emotional awareness, and learn how to support a fitness and wellness lifestyle through nutrition, competition and entertainment.

  • Community

  • Tony Jay Henderson
